Package sprites

Class Map

java.lang.Object
sprites.Map
public class Map extends Object
Represents the map that contains level data for the premade level Games

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Map​(String filename)
    Initializes a 2D character array with information representing the level map from a text file

  • Constructor Details

    • Map

      public Map​(String filename)
      Initializes a 2D character array with information representing the level map from a text file
      Parameters:
      filename - the name and file path of the .txt file containing the map data

  • Method Details

    • setup

      public void setup​(processing.core.PApplet marker)
      initializes images for debris walls/clear lines and loads these Sprites onto a PApplet
      Parameters:
      marker - the PApplet where the Sprites will be drawn

    • scroll

      public void scroll​(int scrollSpeed)
      Scrolls the entire map downward by the specified number of pixels per frame
      Parameters:
      scrollSpeed - the speed, in pixels per frame, that the map will scroll down by

    • makeSprites

      public void makeSprites​(processing.core.PApplet marker)
      Adds Sprites representing the walls and clear lines of the map to a List with their position and image data
      Parameters:
      marker - the marker upon which these Sprites will be drawn

    • getWallRects

      public List<List<Sprite>> getWallRects()
      Returns a List of all Sprites comprising the map
      Returns:
      a List of all Sprites that comprise the map

    • getGrid

      public char[][] getGrid()
      Returns a 2D character array read from a text file that represents the Game map
      Returns:
      a 2d character array read from a text file that represents the Game map

    • draw

      public void draw​(processing.core.PApplet marker)
      Draws the map onto a PApplet
      Parameters:
      marker - the PApplet upon which the map will be drawn

    • readData

      public void readData​(String filename, char[][] gameData)
      Reads data from a text file and converts that information to a 2D character array that will represent the map
      Parameters:
      filename - the text file that holds the map information
      gameData - the 2D character array that will be filled with map information from the text file

    • setDimensions

      public void setDimensions​(String file)
      Correctly sets the dimensions of the 2D character array that will represent the level's map
      Parameters:
      file - the file that will be read to determine its dimensions and give the 2D array the correct dimensions
